item.title: James add a quote by Thomas Pynchon
item.description: "If they can get you asking the wrong questions, they don't have to worry about answers." -- Thomas Pynchon

item.title: James add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "..., twice two is four is not life, gentlemen, but the beginning of death." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: James add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "...But they had, perversely, been living among people who were peering into the wrong end of the telescope, or something, and who had convinced themselves that the opposite was true - that the world had once been a splendid, orderly place...and that everything had been slowly, relentlessly falling apart ever since." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: James add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "No matter how much you think you love somebody, you'll step back when the pool of their blood edges up too close." -- Chuck Palahniuk
